response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product represents years of innovation and dedication by our team, and we believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $15,000. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire it for an exclusive price of $20,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential to maximize the product's full potential and achieve remarkable results. I look forward to discussing how this investment could transform your business or life positively.", "product_price": 20000}
